contentSections.imgTitle: A slide showing me walking on the lush green pastures of Gulmarg, Kashmir with some intro text around the graphic
contentSections.desc:
I had taken a graphic design class and we were tasked to create a slide/screen depicting ourselves. I used one of my favorite photographs from Gulmarg, Srinagar to act as the backdrop. To lessen it's effect and so it can be in harmony with our typographic components, I added a greyscale effect to it. Overall, I was pretty satisfied with the outcome.

Used Powerpoint for this.
